name: Memory Match 3
description:
Memory Match 3 is a fun memory and concentration game to exercise and train the brain!

Your memory will be challenged as you concentrate on memorizing where the cards in order to match up pairs of cards.

Memorize the cards and train your brain to find the pairs! Or try to match up three cards at a time for an extra

challenge. Or match up two pairs on each deal.

Would you like to improve your memory and concentration? Then Memory Match 3 is the game for you! Memory Match 3 is both

a fun and educational game of memory and matching. Logical scoring encourages repeat play for improvement to train your

brain and develop memory. The more you play, the better your memory becomes!

Many difficulty levels, suitable for kids and children of all ages as well as adults of any age. High-quality graphics

and configurable levels of detail to allow customizing the display to suit varying preferences.

Three modes of play:

- Classic match pairs, match up two cards at a time.

- Tricky match three, match up three cards at a time.

- Match pairs double, match up two cards at a time.. twice! Pairs of pairs.

Features:

* Three types of match games

* 10 difficulty levels within each type, 30 total

* High-quality animated graphics, with many customizations possible

* Configurable graphic detail for adults who prefer a "cleaner" look, or kids who prefer more "effects"

* Attractive awards and detailed stats

* Simple, intuitive controls

* Non-blocking touch interface (no "forced wait" after reveal, clicking next card will immediately continue)

* Logical non-timer-based scoring to encourage repeat play and improvement

* Auto-adjusts to fit any device

* Educational memory and concentration game, suitable for all ages
